::Ender::
    "Ender terrorize."  He keeps his voice low so as not to be heard.  His 
transformation is fairly simple and he comes out of it equiped with a large 
sickle like weapon in each hand.  Very little else changes except that his 
insectoid head pulls down to reveal a humanoid head.  He quietly attaches the 
twin sickles two his back and draws two sidearms.  "I am ready."
